<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="doctor">733ea5b4972c0210ad42f62de053af22</macroponent><name>ProcessFlow</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    
    const status = api.data.appointment_record.output[0].status;
    //const test = api.data.look_up_record_1.output;
    debugger;
    //let stateData = [{"id":"step1","label":"Not started","progress":"none"},{"id":"step2","label":"Active","progress":"partial"},{"id":"step3","label":"In progress","progress":"partial"},{"id":"step4","label":"Complete","progress":"done","disabled":true}];
   let stateData =[];
   console.log(status);
    //let status = 1;
     
    //console.log(status);
   if(status == "1"){
        stateData.push({
                    'id': 'step' + 1,
                    'label': 'Draft',
                    'progress': 'done',
                    'disabled': false
                });
                stateData.push({
                    'id': 'step' + 2,
                    'label': "Send for approval",
                    'progress': 'none',
                    'disabled': false
                });
                stateData.push({
                    'id': 'step' + 3,
                    'label': "Booked",
                    'progress': 'none',
                    'disabled': false
                });
                stateData.push({
                    'id': 'step' + 4,
                    'label': "Closed",
                    'progress': 'none',
                    'disabled': false
                });
    }
    else if(status == "5"){
        stateData.push({
                    'id': 'step' + 1,
                    'label': 'Draft',
                    'progress': 'done',
                    'disabled': false
                });
                stateData.push({
                    'id': 'step' + 2,
                    'label': "Send for approval",
                    'progress': 'done',
                    'disabled': false
                });
                stateData.push({
                    'id': 'step' + 3,
                    'label': "Booked",
                    'progress': 'none',
                    'disabled': false
                });
                stateData.push({
                    'id': 'step' + 4,
                    'label': "Closed",
                    'progress': 'none',
                    'disabled': false
                });
    }
    else if(status == "2"){
        stateData.push({
                    'id': 'step' + 1,
                    'label': 'Draft',
                    'progress': 'done',
                    'disabled': false
                });
                stateData.push({
                    'id': 'step' + 2,
                    'label': "Send for approval",
                    'progress': 'done',
                    'disabled': false
                });
                stateData.push({
                    'id': 'step' + 3,
                    'label': "Booked",
                    'progress': 'done',
                    'disabled': false
                });
                stateData.push({
                    'id': 'step' + 4,
                    'label': "Closed",
                    'progress': 'none',
                    'disabled': false
                });
    }
    else if(status == "4"){
        stateData.push({
                    'id': 'step' + 1,
                    'label': 'Draft',
                    'progress': 'done',
                    'disabled': false
                });
                stateData.push({
                    'id': 'step' + 2,
                    'label': "Send for approval",
                    'progress': 'done',
                    'disabled': false
                });
                stateData.push({
                    'id': 'step' + 3,
                    'label': "Booked",
                    'progress': 'done',
                    'disabled': false
                });
                stateData.push({
                    'id': 'step' + 4,
                    'label': "Closed",
                    'progress': 'done',
                    'disabled': false
                });
    }
     api.setState('statusFlowValues', stateData);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-21 16:56:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>884e29b4972c0210ad42f62de053af30</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ProcessFlow</sys_name><sys_package display_value="MediMeet" source="x_1287841_medimeet">e64c7230975c8210ad42f62de053af5c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="MediMeet">e64c7230975c8210ad42f62de053af5c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_884e29b4972c0210ad42f62de053af30</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-21 16:56:13</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
